feature.name: encounterClass
feature.description: Type of encounter (emergency, impatient, outpatient, etc)

feature.name: admissionYear
feature.description: Year of admission to hospital

feature.name: primaryReasonCode
feature.description: ICD 10 code of the primary reason for the encounter

feature.name: gender
feature.description: Gender of the patient

feature.name: age
feature.description: Age of the patient at reference point

pivot.name: code
pivot.description: Vital signs collected in an encounter

feature.name: value
feature.description: Value of the vital sign

pivot.name: code
pivot.description: Important lab results to be evaluated features

feature.name: value
feature.description: Value of the lab result

pivot.name: code
pivot.description: Symptoms to be evaluated as features

feature.name: display
feature.description: Whether the symptom is observed or not

feature.name: lvef
feature.description: Value of left ventricular ejection fraction

feature.name: ecg_qrs_duration
feature.description: Duration of QRS wave

feature.name: ecg_qrs_axis
feature.description: Axis of QRS wave

feature.name: ecg_qt_duration_corrected
feature.description: Duration of QT wave corrected

feature.name: ecg_st
feature.description: ST-elevation

feature.name: ecg_ischemia_without_st
feature.description: Ischemia without st-elevation

feature.name: ecg_type_of_rhythm
feature.description: Type of rhythm

feature.name: smoker
feature.description: Whether the patient is smoking currently. We check the last smoking status record and expect that it does not have an end date indicating that the patient is a current smoker

filter.name: smokingStatus
filter.fhirPath: startTime.exists()

feature.name: startTime
feature.description: Start time of smoking period

feature.name: endTime
feature.description: End time of smoking period

feature.name: totalSmokingDuration
feature.description: Total duration of smoking in days.

feature.name: startTime
feature.description: Total number of smoking periods.

feature.name: formerSmoker
feature.description: Whether the patient smoked within 1 year prior to the admission.

feature.name: value
feature.description: New York Heart Assessment value

feature.name: categorizedValue
feature.description: Severity of hyperkalemia

feature.name: categorizedValue
feature.description: Severity of chronic kidney disease

filter.name: heartFailure

feature.description: Time elapsed (in months) since heart failure is observed for the first time until the reference time point.

filter.name: ap
filter.fhirPath: icd10Code.startsWith('I20')

feature.name: occurred
feature.description: Whether the patient has angina pectoris in their clinical history prior to the date of the data point (i.e. the reference time point)

filter.name: af
filter.fhirPath: icd10Code.startsWith('I48')

feature.name: occurred

filter.name: cm

filter.name: dysl

feature.name: occurred

feature.name: occurred
feature.description: Whether the patient has obstructive sleep apnea in their clinical history prior to the date of the data point (i.e. the reference time point)

filter.name: rd
filter.fhirPath: icd10Code.startsWith('M05') or icd10Code.startsWith('M06') or icd10Code.startsWith('M31.5') or icd10Code.startsWith('M32') or icd10Code.startsWith('M33') or icd10Code.startsWith('M34') or icd10Code.startsWith('M35.1') or icd10Code.startsWith('M35.3') or icd10Code.startsWith('M36.0')

feature.name: occurred
feature.description: Whether the patient has renal disease chronic in their clinical history prior to the date of the data point (i.e. the reference time point)

filter.name: hosp_for_heart_failure

feature.name: exists
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of heart failure after the reference time point.

filter.name: hosp_for_CV_disease
filter.fhirPath: primaryReasonCode.startsWith('I') or primaryReasonCode.startsWith('G45') or primaryReasonCode.startsWith('J81') or primaryReasonCode.startsWith('K76.1') or primaryReasonCode.startsWith('R57')

feature.name: exists
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of any cardiovascular condition after the reference time point.

filter.name: hosp_for_non_cv_disease
filter.fhirPath: (primaryReasonCode.startsWith('I') or primaryReasonCode.startsWith('G45') or primaryReasonCode.startsWith('J81') or primaryReasonCode.startsWith('K76.1') or primaryReasonCode.startsWith('R57')).not()

feature.name: exists
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of any non-cardiovascular condition after the reference time point.

filter.name: hosp_for_renal_complications
filter.fhirPath: primaryReasonCode.startsWith('N18') or primaryReasonCode.startsWith('N19')

feature.name: exists
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of any renal complication after the reference time point.

filter.name: isCardivascular
filter.fhirPath: causeOfDeath.startsWith('I') or causeOfDeath.startsWith('G45') or causeOfDeath.startsWith('J81') or causeOfDeath.startsWith('K76.1') or causeOfDeath.startsWith('R57')

feature.name: causeOfDeath
feature.description: Whether the patient dies because of any cardiovascular condition after the reference time point.

filter.name: isRenal
filter.fhirPath: causeOfDeath.startsWith('N18') or causeOfDeath.startsWith('N19')

feature.name: causeOfDeath
feature.description: Whether the patient dies because of any renal complication after the reference time point.

filter.name: isNonRenalAndNonCV
filter.fhirPath: (causeOfDeath.startsWith('N18') or causeOfDeath.startsWith('N19')).not() and (causeOfDeath.startsWith('I') or causeOfDeath.startsWith('G45') or causeOfDeath.startsWith('J81') or causeOfDeath.startsWith('K76.1') or causeOfDeath.startsWith('R57')).not()

feature.name: causeOfDeath
feature.description: Whether the patient dies because of any non-cardiovascular and non-renal condition after the reference time point.
